TopicTitle: Land Speed Record ON THE MUN

Articles.Content:
Challenge is simple. How fast can you go well still in contact with the surface of the mun?

Only stock parts though (mechjeb is alowed but not for use in challenge)

Ill Start off with a measly 41.6m/s. Any faster and ill either bounce out of control or my module will fall apart. Mine aint excatly built for speed :-[.

Proof must include your pic of max speed AND proof that your craft came to a controled stop after the speed run fully intact.

I recommend a quicksave. The challenge isnt as easy as it seems mun has low gravity and bounces around 30ms can rip your command module off.

1. CtrlAltELITE - 41.6m/s

Bigtrak can hit 250 M/S if you do it right. Combination with puddle jumper and such.

Yeah. Hence why i said no mods like that
